name: Tree Traveler
description:
How high will you reach?

Tree traveler is a game about lizards, trying to reach the treetop. Just choose from one of three trees, each featuring different obstacles and get climbing!

Controls

Each tree consists of three invisible lanes. Use the arrow or the A/D keys to switch between them. Every run, you get three lives. Hit something and you will lose one. When you select a tree, the height is shown. When time passes, your current hight increases. Reach the treetop height to finish!

Features

- four unlockable lizards

- three differently themed trees

- three boss phases near a treetop

The game can be played in your browser, but for Windows users there is also a downloadable version below.
